title: Corrupted files!
body:
So when I go back on my computer after not playing for a week a click the lol icon it says, "Files are corrupted we will try to fix them". Than after that it crashs than says bugsplat, after that I go to the hextech repair. I hit reinstall than it says it can't find the file lolclient.exe.
Pls rito

replies.body: It sounds like the executable for LoL was damaged somehow, since trying to reinstall says that it can't even find the .exe file at all. Take that Hextech Repair Tool and run it specifically with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on. That will make sure that you have a fresh install of the game that should work properly!
